gameinterfaces

Interface Creature

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Monster, Player

    public interface Creature
    A class that implements this interface should have the following attributes:
    • name: String
    • description: String
    • hitPoints: int
    • damage: int
    • room: Room
    The implementing class should only have the following constructor: public Creature(String name, String description, int hitPoints, int damage) room should be initialized to null provide getters for the following attributes: name, description, hitPoints, damage, Room. provide setters for the following attributes: hitPoints, damage, Room.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attack(Creature creature)
      This method displays a message containing the following:
      "this.name attacks target creature's name, dealing damage damage"
      boolean isAlive()
      This method return true if this Creature has positive hitPoints.
      void takeDamage(int damage)
      This method subtracts the specified amount of damage from hitPoits.
      java.lang.String toString() 

    • Method Detail

      • attack

        void attack(Creature creature)
        This method displays a message containing the following:
        "this.name attacks target creature's name, dealing damage damage"
        Parameters:
        creature - A reference to the target Creature object being attacked

      • takeDamage

        void takeDamage(int damage)
        This method subtracts the specified amount of damage from hitPoits. Please note that hitPoints cannot go below zero.
        Parameters:
        damage - The amount of damage inflicted on this Creature.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
        This method return true if this Creature has positive hitPoints.
        Returns:
        true if this Creature has positive hitPoints, false otherwise.

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A String formatted as follows:

        "name %15s, description %20s, hitPoints %03d, damage %02d"
